name: Bubble Lines
description:
Hey there. Glad to you visited me :) This is a very interesting and involving game which will challenge your mind. 

Collect 5 or more bubbles of one color in one line to clear their place and make points. More bubbles gathered higher points achieved.

How to play:

1. Select a ball by tapping on it. It will start jumping.
2. Tap an empty field to move a ball to that position.
3. Ball will move to the selected position only if it will find an opened path to it.
4. Match the balls of the same color to the lines of 5 (horizontal, vertical, diagonal) to blow them and get score.
5. Diagonal lines give more score.
6. Blow line of balls the same as background color to get even more score.
7. Don't forget to use buttons under the field. They will help you rich better result. Note that they cost some "riches" to be used and the price is always growing. Don't worry, you will earn "riches" in the and of each game.
8. Have fun. :)

NOTE: blowing bubbles of a background color will give more points.
